Package org.easybatch.core.job

This package contains easy batch core implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Job
    Interface that represent an Easy Batch job.
    JobMonitorMBean
    JMX MBean interface to expose monitoring attributes.
    JobReportFormatter<T>
    Job report formatter interface.
    JobReportMerger
    A service that merges multiple reports into a global report.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DefaultJobReportFormatter
    Default job report formatter.
    DefaultJobReportMerger
    A report merger that generates a merged report defined as follows: The start time is the minimum of start times The end time is the maximum of end times The total records is the sum of total records The total skipped records is the sum of total skipped records The total filtered records is the sum of total filtered records The total error records is the sum of total error records The total success records is the sum of total success records The final job result is a list of all job results The final data source name is the concatenation (one per line) of data sources names The final status is JobStatus.COMPLETED (if all partials are completed) or JobStatus.ABORTED (if one of partials has been aborted) or JobStatus.FAILED (if one of partials has failed).
    JobBuilder
    Job instance builder.
    JobExecutor
    Helper class to execute a Job.
    JobMetrics
    Metrics of a job.
    JobParameters
    Parameters of a job.
    JobReport
    Class holding job reporting data.
    JobResult
    Job result holder.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JobStatus
    Enumeration of job status values.

Package org.easybatch.core.job Description

This package contains easy batch core implementation.
